description: Provides the information necessary to update a configured audience model. Updates that impact audience generation jobs take effect when a new job starts, but do not impact currently running jobs.

parameters.name: configuredAudienceModelArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configured audience model that you want to update.

parameters.name: outputConfig
parameters.description: The new output configuration. Defines the Amazon S3 bucket where the configured audience is stored. The Amazon S3 bucket and path for the configured audience. The Amazon S3 location URI. The ARN of the IAM role that can write the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_params.name: destination
nested_params.description: Defines the Amazon S3 bucket where the configured audience is stored.

nested_params.name: s3Destination
nested_params.description: The Amazon S3 bucket and path for the configured audience.

nested_params.name: roleArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the IAM role that can write the Amazon S3 bucket.

parameters.name: sharedAudienceMetrics
parameters.description: The new value for whether to share audience metrics. (string) ---

parameters.name: audienceSizeConfig
parameters.description: The new audience size configuration. Whether the audience output sizes are defined as an absolute number or a percentage. An array of the different audience output sizes. (integer) ---

nested_params.name: audienceSizeType
nested_params.description: Whether the audience output sizes are defined as an absolute number or a percentage.

nested_params.name: audienceSizeBins
nested_params.description: An array of the different audience output sizes.

nested_items.name: configuredAudienceModelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configured audience model that was updated.
